BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Savino, S.1610, and Assembly Member Brook-Krasny, et al., A.6599, “AN ACT to authorize the city of New York to discontinue the use as parkland of parcels of  real  property  in  the  borough  of  Brooklyn  in exchange  for the dedication of certain other lands in the borough of Brooklyn for park purposes in furtherance of a comprehensive development plan for Coney Island.”
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Discontinue the use as parkland of parcels of  real  property  in  the  borough  of  Brooklyn  in exchange  for the dedication of certain other lands in the borough of Brooklyn for park purposes in furtherance of a comprehensive development plan for Coney

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Savino, S.1610, and Assembly Member Brook-Krasny, et al., A.6599, “AN ACT to authorize the city of New York to discontinue the use as parkland of parcels of  real  property  in  the  borough  of  Brooklyn  in exchange  for the dedication of certain other lands in the borough of Brooklyn for park purposes in furtherance of a comprehensive development plan for Coney Island.”
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Discontinue the use as parkland of parcels of  real  property  in  the  borough  of  Brooklyn  in exchange  for the dedication of certain other lands in the borough of Brooklyn for park purposes in furtherance of a comprehensive development plan for Coney
